helper_deck_shortcuts: to flip - Left/Right arrows to move cards quickly
flashcards_hint: Tap the card to flip. Mark as Known / Learning.
flashcards_empty: No data yet. Click Import/Manage to load JSON.
quiz_empty: No quiz data. Import JSON and choose a deck.
quiz_type_placeholder: Type the answer and press Enter...
footer_note: Multi-file HTML - localStorage - Import append/create - Export backup
helper_tip_import: Import JSON via Import/Manage to add decks.
helper_tip_flash: Tap a card or press Space to flip; mark Known/Learning.
helper_tip_quiz: Pick Quiz type, then use New question or Enter to submit.
helper_tip_audio: Choose a voice, then use Listen or Auto speak.
modal_desc: Import adds data, it does not overwrite. You can append to an existing deck or create a new one.
json_ai_desc: If you want AI to generate JSON, copy the prompt below and fill in your topic/quantity. The result must be valid JSON.
hint_add_examples: Tip: add examples in JSON to show sample sentences.
confirm_reset_progress: Reset progress (Known/Learning) for the current deck?
confirm_delete_deck: Delete deck "{title}"? (This will also remove its progress)
json_error_no_items: Valid JSON but no items found. Use {items:[...]} or an array.
json_error_no_deck_append: No deck to append to. Choose "Create new deck".
json_error_title_required: You have not entered a title for the new deck.
paste_failed: Cannot read clipboard. Please paste manually.
